oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Eprints – www.orgprints.org: The Online Archive for Information on Organic Food and Farming Research
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Willer, Helga
Rasmussen, Ilse
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research communication and quality
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation introduces the use of Organic Eprints, the online archive for papers on organic farming research.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Willer, Helga and Rasmussen, Ilse (2011) Organic Eprints – www.orgprints.org: The Online Archive for Information on Organic Food and Farming Research. Workshop at: Training Challenges for the Agricultural Professionals: The Organic.Balkanet Experience, Bucharest, Romania, November 16, 2011. [Completed]
